Project9_key3: In this project you need to make a musical instrument piano, when you will press different `keys` it will give different sounds like "Sa" "Re" "Ga" "Ma" "Pa" "Dha" "Ni" "Sa".
Project9_key4: On google find the sounds of Sa" "Re" "Ga" "Ma" "Pa" "Dha" "Ni" "Sa". those may be notes of "saregamapa" or differnet it is ok like drum sounds.
Project9_key5: For your idea start making the front end look by using html, this is your musical instrument, it should have some buttons, by using tags we can give different sound to each button.
Project9_key6: You have to learn about `key`press in javascript. it has predefined properties and funstions understand them first and use them.
Project9_key9: in `key`press event we will store a `key` on which value is stored. you can use switch case for finding which `key` is pressed on `key`board and play corresponding sound on `code`.
Project9_key10: with giving sound , you can use some css effects to visible teh button big when we pressed that `key`
